name: Indie Game Dev Beginner's Jam
description:
Skeleton House and I teamed up to complete a game for the Indie Game Dev Beginner's jam! https://itch.io/jam/indie-game-dev-beginners-003

Please give us feedback on feel so far! Enemy/player speed, shoot frequency for each weapon, enemy health, drop rate, weapon ammo, etc. We got polishing and testing to do, but the core gameplay and features are set. We're also obviously looking for bugs (there's at least one where some enemies might be invincible -_- )

INTENDED FOR DESKTOP, NOT MOBILE <3
